entries: This armor never gets dirty.
You can doff this armor as an action.

This weapon is ornately decorated with elegant details in brimstone and obsidian. It smells of iron and incense. When you attune to this weapon, you must whisper your true name to it. The name sears across the weapon in Infernal runes, then fades.

The typical True Name, an uncommon item, empowers an illrigger's Baleful Interdict. Whenever you roll an 18, 19, or 20 on your attack roll with this weapon and place a seal on a creature as part of the attack, you can place an additional seal on that creature.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Whilst you are wielding this weapon, you cannot be suprised. Additionally, when you roll initiative you can grant any friendly ally within 60ft an additional 1d6 to that roll. This benefit can be used once per short rest.

magicvariant.name: Grit Armour
entries: This may also be applied to Clothing

A measure of protection reinforced with scales. While attuned, you can use a bonus action to enter a defensive stance, losing half your movement speed from any source and taking 2 less damage from all sources. This stance lasts until the start of your next turn. Usable proficiency bonus times per long rest.
If the user has the Heavy Armour Master feat, they must choose between applying Grit reduction and Heavy Armour Master reduction to a given source of damage. They do not stack.
Any light armour / medium armour

This armour has a grappling hook built into one of the plates. While wearing this set of armour you can cast the *Thorn Whip* spell without components and with 40ft of range, using Strength or Dexterity as the spellcasting attribute. If it targets a wall/ceiling, it can instead pull you up to 20ft closer to the wall/ceiling.
The 150gp price of this item is in addition to the price of the armor
You can provide the armour as part of purchasing this to discount this item by the Armour Price.
This armour has been enchanted to assist its user in shielding their allies.

As a reaction to a hostile creature targeting you or an ally within 20ft with an attack, you can move up to half your movement speed towards the attacker. If the attack was towards an ally, you may instead move towards the ally and force yourself to be the target of that attack if you get within 5ft of them. Usable proficiency bonus times per long rest.
The 300gp price of this item is in addition to the price of the armor
You can provide the armour as part of purchasing this to discount this item by the Armour Price.

A number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest you may use your action to enter a stance. As part of entering this stance you may forgo any amount of attacks you may make this turn to make one. This attack deals 2d8 + Strength or Dexterity, and an additional 1d8 per attack you could make. If this attack hits an enemy they need to make a constitution saving throw equal to 8 + Proficiency bonus + Strength or Dexterity. If they fail, all attacks have advantage to hit them until the start of their next turn, as your mighty strike breaks their composure.

Weapon (any simple or martial weapon)
While attuned, you have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with this weapon.
Furthermore, you gain an additional use of the "Second Wind" feature, and gain a +1 bonus to the amount of hit points recovered when you use the second wind feature.
